landing.title: Get recruited on the exclusive network for the skilled work force.
landing.introduction: Have employers message you with job opportunities you qualify for. Our network is exclusively for students and grads of recent community and technical colleges in the US. Fill out our contact form to request to join for free.

benefits.title: Get hired in the fields you trained for/take full advantage of your training and credentials.
benefits.description: Join an exclusive network that only allows credentialed talent, so your profile doesnâ€™t get lost amongst hundreds of others like on Indeed and Monster.

benefits.title: Get contacted be employers, rather than you having to find and contact them.
benefits.description: Talk directly with recruiters and hiring managers via text, phone and email.

benefits.title: Minimize down time between school and work.
benefits.description: Unlock your career potential. Line up employment before you graduate, or get an internship, apprenticeship or clinical while still in school.
